```{r}
library(Lahman)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
head(HallOfFame, 3)

HallOfFame %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = yearID, fill = inducted)) +
  geom_bar() +
  xlim(c(1936, 2024))
```

```{r}
write.csv(HallOfFame, "HallOfFame.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
